@renato_shira
 ¬∑ Apr 25, 2019
Introducing SOPR: spent outputs to predict bitcoin local lows and tops. The SOPR  is calculated from spent outputs. It's the realized value (in USD) divided by the value at creation (in USD) of the output. Or simply: price sold / price paid. https://medium.com/@renato_shira/introducing-sopr-spent-outputs-to-predict-bitcoin-lows-and-tops-ceb4536b3b9‚Ä¶
